[[Zabuza]] creates a [[Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet Technique|water dragon]], which [[Haku]] [[Ice Release|freezes]] and launches it at the opponent, trapping them in an ice pillar. Haku jumps between the surrounding ice pieces, attacking the imprisoned opponent. Zabuza finishes it with an upwards slash along the ice pillar, splitting it in half and causing it to crumble.
